metadata.Title: CVE-2023-51385 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In ssh in OpenSSH before 9.6, OS command injection might occur if a username or host name has shell metacharacters, and this name is referenced byan expansion token in certain situations. For example, an untrusted Gitrepository can have a submodule with shell metacharacters in a user name orhost name.

criterions.comment: openssh package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
